    <facet>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:K100_9</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>K100_9</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">The Beveridge vision</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Beveridge Anblick</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La vision de Beveridge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A visão de Beveridge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Visione di Beveridge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το όραμα Beveridge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La visión de Beveridge</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">This Unit looks at the work of William Beveridge in reforming the field of social welfare after World War II. Particular attention is paid to the attitude towards women and immigrants to the United Kingdom.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Health and Lifestyle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Beveridge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Immigrants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Racism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Social_welfare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Welfare_policy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Maßeinheit betrachtet die Arbeit von 
William Beveridge, wenn sie auffangene der Sozialwohlfahrt nach dem
Zweiten Weltkrieg verbessert. Wird die einstellung gegenüber 
Frauen und Immigranten in das Vereinigte Königreich insbesondere 
beachtet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette unité regarde le travail de William 
Beveridge en reformant la zone du bien-être social après la 
deuxième guerre mondiale. Une attention particulière est 
prêtée à l'attitude envers des femmes et des immigrés vers le 
Royaume-Uni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta unidade olha o trabalho de William Beveridge
em reformar o campo do bem-estar social após a segunda guerra 
mundial. A atenção particular é pagada à atitude para 
mulheres e immigrants ao Reino Unido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa unità guarda il lavoro di William 
Beveridge nella riforma del campo di benessere sociale dopo la seconda
guerra mondiale. Particolare attenzione è prestata 
all'atteggiamento nei confronti delle donne e degli immigranti nel 
Regno Unito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η μονάδα εξετάζει την εργασία William 
Beveridge στη μεταρρύθμιση του πεδίου της κοινωνικής ευημερίας 
μετά από τον παγκόσμιο πόλεμο ΙΙ. Ιδιαίτερη προσοχή 
δίνεται στάση απέναντι στις γυναίκες και τους μετανάστες στο 
Ηνωμένο Βασίλειο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta unidad mira el trabajo de Guillermo 
Beveridge en reformar el campo de la asistencia social después de la 
Segunda Guerra Mundial. La atención determinada se presta a la 
actitud hacia mujeres e inmigrantes al Reino Unido.</string>
          </description>
